title: sEra vArum
sahitya:
sEra vArum jagattIr enrazhaittAr jnAnat-tEn aruviyAi shezhittAr tAyumAnavar


anupallavi

  pArAlayattilE Aruyir uidiDap-parAparak-kaNNiyaip-pADiya mahariSi


caraNam    aduvAnAl aduvAm shuddhAnandak-kaLippena anbu nilai kATTi arivu nilaikk-Etrip-
poduvAna vEdAnta siddhAnta samarasap-poruLinai maunamAi aruLiya gurunAthan
